Episode #1
"A Stitch In Time"

Inspector Kiera Cameron loses everything she has and finds herself on a new mission when she and eight dangerous terrorists are transported from their time in 2077 back to 2012 during the terroristâ€™s attempt to escape execution. She takes on a new identity and joins the VPD in order to stop the terroristsâ€™ reign of violence. Along the way, she befriends Alec Sadler, the 17 year old who will one day grow up to create the technology her world is built upon.
Good quality, Good show! Thanks for the up!

Good quality.

Actually, this show is pretty good.  The story is good and acting is good.

Can't wait to see episode 2.  But I do not see this show can last longer than 3 seasons.  Anyway, it's a good show, so far.
